title: Prayed fard, joined another congregation in 2nd rakah as voluntary, do i need to makeup missed rakah
transcript: he was asking about a situation where he prayed risha in the masjid and then he went to another area a house friend's house or another masjid and they found them still praying isha so he missed two raka's so he prayed the last two raka's with the imam now we know that this is a voluntary prayer because he had already prayed isha is he obliged after the imam offers salam to stand up and complete for raqqa's answers no once the imam offers salam he concluded two raka's he can offer it salaam and exit the prayer without any problem
